greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct primes p such that p^p divides the arithmetic derivative of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
xref: Cf. A003415, A129251, A327929 (indices of nonzero terms), A327932.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 01 2019
